  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_355</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_355</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Procedimiento para analizar una función</string>
            <string language="en">The procedure of analysing a function</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Prozedur des Analysierens einer Funktion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le procédé d'analyser une fonction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O procedimento de analisar uma função</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La procedura di analizzare una funzione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η διαδικασία μια λειτουργία</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el análisis de la gráfica de una función. Se estudia la información que proporciona la derivada de la función y se construye la gráfica utilizando también los límites para el cálculo de sus asíntotas.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to analyse the graph of a function. It studies the information provided by the derivative of the function and its graph is drawn using the information provided by limits used to calculate its asymptotes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">asíntota</string>
            <string language="en">asymptote</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">límite</string>
            <string language="en">limit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">derivada</string>
            <string language="en">derivative</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">gráfica</string>
            <string language="en">graph</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">función</string>
            <string language="en">function</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das Diagramm einer Funktion zu analysieren. Sie 
studiert die Informationen, die von der Ableitung der Funktion 
bereitgestellt werden und sein Diagramm wird mit den Informationen 
gezeichnet, die von den Begrenzungen bereitgestellt werden, die 
verwendet werden, um seine Asymptotes zu errechnen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'analyser le graphique d'une fonction. Elle étudie
l'information fournie par le dérivé de la fonction et son graphique 
est tracé en utilisant l'information fournie par des limites 
employées pour calculer ses asymptotes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações analisar 
o gráfico de uma função. Estuda a informação fornecida pelo
derivative da função e seu gráfico é desenhado usando a 
informação fornecida pelos limites usados calcular seus asymptotes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
analizzare il grafico di una funzione. Studia le informazioni 
fornite dal derivato della funzione ed il relativo grafico è 
tracciato usando le informazioni fornite dai limiti usati per 
calcolare i relativi asymptotes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να αναλύσει τη γραφική παράσταση μιας λειτουργίας. 
Μελετά τις πληροφορίες που παρέχονται από το παράγωγο της 
λειτουργίας και η γραφική παράστασή της σύρεται χρησιμοποιώντας 
τις πληροφορίες που παρέχονται από τα όρια που χρησιμοποιούνται 
για να υπολογίσουν τις ασύμπτωτούς της.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Asymptote</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Begrenzung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ableitung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diagramm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">asymptote</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">limite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">graphique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fonction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">asymptote</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gráfico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">função</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">asymptote</string>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λειτουργία</string>
          </keyword>
